label: kind/upgrade-consideration
impact/high
notes.text: Updated the proxy-init container in edge-24.6.4 to request the same memory and CPU as the proxy, removing the need to explicitly set proxy-init's resource requests.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added support for GrpcRoute resources in the policy-controller's status controller, allowing the policy controller to watch GrpcRoute resources in the cluster and keep their status up to date, similar to how it handles HttpRoute resources.
